title: Anindilyakwa (1992) Genesis Portion (Jenijija)
description: This fragment of the book of Genesis, chapters 1 through 4, was translated from the Hebrew into Anindilyakwa by the Bible Society in Australia in 1992. Anindilyakwa is an aboriginal language spoken in Australia.

language.name: Anindilyakwa
language.area: Northern Territory, Groote Eylandt, Gulf of Carpenteria.
